channel.title: Home on Matt Waite
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Matt Waite

item.title: About
item.description: I’ve been a reporter, a developer, a consultant and a professor. I believe in meeting students where they are, and believe passionately that anyone can learn to use code to make interesting journalism, regardless of where they are starting from.

item.title: Note about the new site
item.description: I’m experimenting with Blogdown and intending to update with notes about the materials as I go. Notes will be updates about materials, posts will be about new materials or major updates.
